author: Staff Reporter
text: A Trinamool Congress worker was shot dead in the Kaliachak area of West Bengal’s Malda district allegedly in a faction feud. The body of Sabek Momin (45), a resident of the Jadupur area of Kaliachak, was found in a garden by his wife Farida Bibi on Thursday. She alleged Mr. Momin was “murdered” by Bakul Seikh, an expelled TMC worker belonging to a rival faction of the party.
title: Trinamool worker killed in faction feud
